import moment from 'moment' import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Avatar from '../Avatar' const JobApplicant = ({jobStatus}) => { return (
{jobStatus.jobs.map(job => (
{job.userId.username}
Applied on: {moment(job.createdAt).fromNow()}
Reason of applying: {job.sop}
))}
) } export default JobApplicant
